DOC.brief_summary: This study monitor safety FS VH S/D evaluate whether FS VH S/D superior conventional surgical procedure reduction lymphatic leakage seal axillary lymphatics subject undergo lumpectomy level I II axillary lymph node dissection two separate incision .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Fibrin Sealant Vapor Heated Solvent/Detergent Treated ( FS VH S/D ) Reduction Lymphatic Leakage Sealing Axillary Lymph Node Dissection Sites
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent obtain subject prior FS VH S/D administration Female subject > = 19 year age Subjects breast cancer schedule undergo lumpectomy breast level I II axillary lymphadenectomy two separate incision Subjects know hypersensitivity aprotinin component product Subjects immunodeficiency Subjects increase red cell production ( e.g. , hemolytic anemia ) Subjects coagulation disorder show exceed normal range follow : prothrombin time ( PT ) , Quick , activate partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) , fibrinogen level , thrombocyte . Subjects previously axillary surgery Subjects undergone irradiation therapy axillary tissue Subjects ever receive chemotherapy surgery
